H0.text: Microwaves are the kind of waves used in radar guns.

H1.text: X-rays are the kind of waves used in radar guns.

H2.text: WIFI is the type of waves used in radar guns.

H3.text: Radio waves are used in radar guns.

A4.text: Radar speed guns consist of a radio transmitter and receiver.

A5.text: Radar guns that operate using the X band (8 to 12 GHz) frequency range are becoming less common because they produce a strong and easily detectable beam.
